Deprecated API

Contents
  • Deprecated Methods
Deprecated Methods
com.sun.xml.ws.commons.virtualbox.IVirtualBox.createLegacyMachine(String, String, UUID)
          This method may be removed later. It is better to use IVirtualBox#createMachine().
There is no way to change the name of the settings file of the created machine.
 
com.sun.xml.ws.commons.virtualbox.IVirtualBox.findVirtualDiskImage(String)
          Use IVirtualBox#findHardDisk() instead.
The specified file path can be absolute (full path) or relative to the IVirtualBox#homeFolder. If only a file name without any path is given, the ISystemProperties#defaultVDIFolder will be used as a path to the image file.
On host systems with case sensitive filesystems, a case sensitive comparison is performed, otherwise the case of symbols in the file path is ignored.
 
com.sun.xml.ws.commons.virtualbox.IVirtualBox.openMachine(String)
          Will be removed soon. 
com.sun.xml.ws.commons.virtualbox.IVirtualBox.openVirtualDiskImage(String)
          Use IVirtualBox#openHardDisk() instead.
Opening differencing images is not supported.
The specified file path can be absolute (full path) or relative to the IVirtualBox#homeFolder. If only a file name without any path is given, the ISystemProperties#defaultVDIFolder will be used as a path to the image file.
